issue.title: [CF 621] Soul Shards still capped at 3
issue.body:
Very minor issue: The maximum number of Soul Shards an Affliction Warlock can have is 4, due to the Glyph of Soul Shards.

The TMW interface still caps the slider's max value at 3. This issue still exists as of the latest release (6.0.3).


> Posted by CurseForge user Lov3star | Imported from CurseForge issue #621 | Raw
